actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to state the finding of Congress that the Amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to compensation for Members of Congress has been duly ratified, and for other purposes.

summary.text: States the finding to the Congress that the proposed amendment to the Constitution (relating to the prohibition to vary the compensation of Members of Congress until an intervening election of Representatives) has been duly ratified.

titles.title: A joint resolution to state the finding of Congress that the Amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to compensation for Members of Congress has been duly ratified, and for other purposes.
